title: Valentino Loco Small Shoulder Bag
description: Valentino Loco small shoulder bag in brown textile with logo patten & black leather trims. Featuring dark silver-tone hardware, detachable & adjustable leather handle shoulder strap. Frontal flap with magnetic snap button and V logo plate opens to a black leather interior with a patch pocket. Approx. dimensions: 19.5cm(L) x 11cm(H) x 5cm(D), handle drop: 23cm, shoulder strap drop 60cm. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned)
